Submission¶

rounded_yield¶

src.models.make_submission.rounded_yield(x: float, crop_yields: list) → float¶

Rounded predictions using the labelled crop yields.

Parameters:

  • x – Current prediction

  • crop_yields – Labelled crop yields values

Type:

float

Type:

list

Returns:

Rounded predictions

Return type:

float
